note: These practice questions are interspersed within the tutorial slides for immediate practice.

questions.questionText: Two complementary angles are in the ratio 2:3. Find the larger angle.
questions.explanation: Let angles be 2x and 3x. Sum = 90°, so 2x + 3x = 90, giving 5x = 90, x = 18. Larger angle = 3x = 54°.

questions.questionText: The length of a rectangle is 12 cm and breadth is 8 cm. Find its area.
questions.explanation: Area of rectangle = Length × Breadth = 12 × 8 = 96 cm².

questions.questionText: Find the circumference of a circle with radius 7 cm. (Use π = 22/7)
Find the volume of a cube with side 6 cm.
The radius of a sphere is 21 cm. Find its surface area. (Use π = 22/7)
